data.actual_result: The width of the tab remains expanded even after clicking on short named role when u select it after clicking on long role. (Approx 14 roles above or below, the width remain the same as according to long named role and not to the selected role)
data.expected_result: The width of the tab should reset according to role name length.
data.short_description: Irregular and improper width of navigate role tab in server settings>members
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a role in a server with a name with the max possible chatacters/ a really long named role. - Go to server settings of a server you have admin perms in and navigate to members setting. - Right next to the text field where you can search members, there's a tab to sort/navigate members role. - Click on a role with short name, now click on the role with really long name and notice the difference in the width. - Just after clicking the long named role, click on any role above.
